name: Timhy
description:
You play Timhy, a robot from the future who tries to protect at all cost his only source of power, his ice machine from a horde of humanoid volatiles who took over the earth.

You will have to maneuver through a maze formed by the ruins of the fallen city and find chipsets to upgrade yourself so that you can survive the waves of fierce enemies who'll try to get their hands on your precious power source.

Producer

Teo Sautereau

Game Programmers

Antoine Hanna - Shahine Benthanane

Game Artists

Julie Teck - Matteo Boizet

Game Designers

Timothe Chabot
